whitebox.algorithms

Class Clump

  • java.lang.Object
    • whitebox.algorithms.Clump

  • public class Clump
extends java.lang.Object
    This algorithm takes an input raster of categorical data (e.g. a land-use image) and assigns a unique identifier value to each contiguous group of same-valued grid cells (i.e. region).
